typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceEmployee
source(output(
		depid as string,
		depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceDepartments
sourceEmployee, sourceDepartments join(department == depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmployeeDepartments
JoinEmployeeDepartments select(mapColumn(
		{Employee ID} = empid,
		{Employee Name} = name,
		Country = country,
		{Department ID} = department,
		{Department Name} = depname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumns
RemoveDuplicateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		depid as string,
		depname as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmployeeDetails.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkEmployeeDetails
